Increases a character's jump elevation by one panel.
When a character takes HP damage, it raises his or her Speed by 1.
Increases the character's chances of evading a Bow/Crossbow attack.
Allows the character to equip a Crossbow, regardless of job.
Makes the enemy unable to evade the character's attacks. If the enemy is within a targeted panel, the attack is sure to succeed.
Restores MP to all allied units on the field.
Restores a small amount of HP to all allied units on the field.
Raises the Speed level of all allied units.
Raises the physical attack power of all allied units.
Raises the magic attack power of all allied units.
Song causes various positive status effects. Adds: Reraise, Regen, Protect, Shell, Haste
Raises ally's CT count to 100.
Character can leap over enemies and obstacles while moving.
Increases character's movement range by three panels.
Raises a character's magic attack power when he or she takes HP damage.
Raises a character's Faith level when he/she's hit with a magical spell.
Calculate CT.

Calculate Exp.
Calculate height.

Calculate multiples of 4.
Calculate multiples of 3.
Character gains Experience Points as he or she moves around.
Character gains a small amount of JP as he or she moves around.
When the character's HP are maxed, he or she shares any excess HP with his or her allies.
Character heals themselves for half of all damage recieved and returns the other half to the attacker as damage.
Increases the Experience Points a character earns by 1.5.
Recovers 30 HP. Causes damage to the undead.
Recovers 70 HP. Causes damage to the undead.
The strongest potion, recovering 150 HP. Causes damage to the undead.
Recovers 20 MP.
Recovers 50 MP.
Restores all HP and MP. Elixirs cannot be found in stores and must be found on the battlefield.
Neutralizes all poisons. Cancels: Poison
Restores sight. Cancels: Darkness
Restores speech, allowing the character to cast spells again. Cancels: Silence
Changes the character back to his/her original shape. Cancels: Frog
A golden needle which cures petrificaction. Cancels: Petrify
Restores life to the undead. Cancels: Undead, Blood Suck
This all-purpose medicine cures most status anomalies. Cancels: Petrify, Darkness, Confusion, Silence, Oil, Frog, Poison, Sleep
This tailfeather revives dead units. Cancels: Dead
Allows the character to find any hidden items on the destination panel.
When a character receives any form of HP damage, he or she uses the lowest-level potion available.
Makes a character able to throw items over an extended range, even if he or she's not a Chemist.
Makes equipped items immune to break techniques.
Allows the character to change equipment in battle. Activated by selecting the action command Equip Change.
Causes MP damage to all enemy units on the battlefield.
Causes HP damage to all enemy units on the battlefield.
Lowers enemy's Speed level.
Lowers enemy's physical attack power.
Lowers enemy's magic attack power.
Dance causes various abnormal statuses to all enemy units no the battlefield. Adds: Darkness, Confusion, Silence, Frog, Poison, Slow, Stop, Sleep
Lowers enemy's CT count to zero.
Increases character's jump elevation by three panels.
Character can leap over enemies and obstacles while moving.
Rasies the character's physical attack power when attacked by the enemy.
This raises the character's Brave level when attacked by the enemy.
Does HP damage and destroys target's armor.
Does HP damage and destroys target's helmet.
Does HP damage and destroys target's weapon.
Does HP damage and destroys target's accessory.
Attack with arctic breath.
Attack with fire breath.
Attack with lightning breath.
Charms enemy Dragon into joining party. Adds: Invitation
Restores ally Dragon's HP and Status by offering own HP. Cancels: Darkness, Confusion, Silence, Oil, Berserk, Frog, Stop, Sleep, Don't Move, Don't Act
Raises ally Dragon's Brave, Speed, physical and magic attack power.
Raises ally Dragon's CT, allowing its attack to occur sooner.
Holy breath randomly attacks targets within effect range.
Prevents target from moving. Adds: Don't Move
Prevents target from attacking. Adds: Don't Act
Turns undead targets into stone. Adds: Petrify
Effective on Natural Surface, Wasteland, Road. Adds: Don't Move

Effective on Grassland, Thicket, Water Plant, Ivy. Adds: Stop
Effective on Gravel, Stone Floor, Stone Wall, Mud Wall, Tombstone. Adds: Petrify

Ice Elemental attack effective on Snow, Ice. Adds: Silence
Wind Elemental attack effective on Roof, Sky, Chimney. Adds: Slow
Fire Elemental attack effective on Lava, Machinery. Adds: Dead
Character can walk easily over watery terrain such as rivers.
Allows the character to move and walk over volcanic terrain.

Destroys target's equipped armor, clothes, or robe, decreasing his/her protection and HP.
Destroys target's equipped shield.
Destroys target's equipped weapon, reducing his/her attack power greatly.
Reduces target's MP by half.
Diminishes target's Speed level, two points at a time.
Reduces target's physical attack power, two points at a time.
Reduces target's magic attack power, two points at a time.
Allows character to evade an attack with an equipped weapon (not always successful).
Allows the character to equip heavy armor, regardless of Job Class.
Allows the character to equip a shield, regardless of Job Class.
Allows the character to equip a sword, regardless of Job Class.
Allows the character to jump two panels horizontally.
Allows the character to jump three panels horizontally.
Allows the character to jump four panels horizontally.
Allows the character to jump five panels horizontally.
Allows the character to jump eight panels horizontally.
Allows the character to jump two panels vertically.
Allows the character to jump three panels vertically.
Allows the character to jump four panels vertically.
Allows the character to jump five panels vertically
Allows the character to jump six panels vertically.
Allows the character to jump seven panels vertically.
Allows the character to jump eight panels vertically.
Allows the character to jump to any height, regardless of jumping ability.
When a character receives HP damage, that character casts the Reraise status.
Allows the character to equip a spear regardless of job.
Turns an enemy into an ally. Adds: Invitation
Resets an enemy's CT count.
Raises target's Brave level by 4 points.
Lowers target's Brave level by 20 points.
Raises target's Faith level by 4 points.
Lowers target's Faith level by 20 points.
Sentences target to death. Adds: Death Sentence
Receive Gil from enemy as tribute.
Character emerges enemy target, causing it to attack wildly, lowering its success rate. Adds: Berserk
Droning on like Professor Daravon puts the target to sleep. Adds: Sleep
Character plugs his or her ears to dodge Talk Skill (word based) attacks.
Allows the character to equip a gun regardless of Job Class.
When an enemy reaches terminal status, the character can persuade it to become an ally.
Allows a character to speak with monsters, even if he or she's not a Mediator.
Character attacks surrounding enemies with his/her fists as he/she spins around.
Character punches the target repeatedly with his/her fist.
Character can attack an enemy from afar with a surge of energy.
A line of energy flowing through the ground causes damage to enemies standing in its path.
Casts a Death Sentence on the enemy after attack. Do not use against undead enemies. Adds: Death Sentence
Use the spirit of Yang to nullify status anomalies. Cancels: Petrify, Darkness, Confusion, Silence, Berserk, Frog, Poison, Sleep, Don't Move, Don't Act
A concentration of Ki restores both HP and MP to the caster and those surrounding him/her.
Resurrects a dead character, restoring his/her HP slightly. Cancels: Dead
Allows the character to recover a small amount of HP as he or she moves around the battlefield.
Restores HP to the character when an attack brings him or her down to critical levels.
Character counters an enemy's physical attack with one of his or her own.
Gives the character a chance to attack before being attacked.
Character gains the bare-handed fighting strength of a Monk, regardless of Job Class.
Allows the character to throw Shuriken.
Allows the character to throw an Elemental Ball.
Allows the character to throw Knives.
Allows the character to throw Swords.
Allows the character to throw Hammers.
Allows the character to throw Katanas.
Allows the character to throw Ninja Swords.
Allows the character to throw Axes.
Allows the character to throw Spears.
Allows the character to throw Sticks.
Allows the character to throw Knight Swords.
Allows the character to throw a Dictionary.
Character can move or stop on water.
Character hides and becomes Invisible once he or she receives HP damage. Adds: Invisible.
Raises the character's evade percentage, allowing him or her to dodge attacks more easily.
The character can use a weapon in each hand, even if he/she's not a Ninja.
Blinding the enemy lowers its success rate at landing physical attacks. Adds: Darkness
Absorbs the target's MP and restores the character's own MP.
Absorbs target's HP and restores the character's own HP.
Temporarily raises the target's Faith level to 100. Adds: Faith
Lowers Faith level to 0. Adds: Innocent
Makes target undead and therefore unable to restore HP. Adds: Undead
Silences target, making it unable to cast spells. Adds: Silence
Enrages target causing it to attack wildly and lowering its success rate. Adds: Berserk
Lowers Brave level by 10 points.
Makes target act unpredictably. Adds: Confusion
Prevents positive status effects. Cancels: Float, Reraise, Transparent, Regen, Protect, Shell, Haste, Faith, Reflect
Prevents target from taking action. Adds: Don't Act
Puts target to sleep. Adds: Sleep
Turns enemy into stone. Adds: Petrify
Allows the character to walk over swamps, marshes, poison marshes, regardless of climate.
The character recovers MP as he or she moves.
Restores character's MP by the same amount the enemy used to cast its spell.
Lessens damage incurred from physical attacks by half.
Restores a small amount of HP
Restores a medium amount of HP.
Restores more HP than Cure 2, but at a greater cost.
Restores a large amount of HP.
Revives dead units and restores half of their HP. Cancels: Dead
Revives dead units and restores the highest amount of HP. Cancels: Dead
Automatically raises units from the dead. Adds: Reraise
Restores HP incrementally over a period of time. Adds: Regen
Decreases amount of physical attack damage sustained. Adds: Protect
Decreases amount of physical attack damage sustained. Has a higher success ratio than Protect. Adds: Protect
Decreases amount of magic attack damage sustained. Adds: Shell
Decreases amount of magic attack damage sustained. Has a higher success ratio than Shell. Adds: Shell
Protects units from both physical and magic attacks. Adds: Protect, Shell
Cures the majority of abnormal statuses. Cancels: Petrify, Darkness, Confusion, Silence, Berserk, Frog, Poison, Sleep, Don't Move, Don't Act
Powerful Holy Elemental attack.
Apply Regen to the character when struck.
Lessens damage caused by enemy magic attacks.
The slashing of an invisible blade causes damage to enemy units.
The wailing of a ghost causes damage to the enemy.
The whisper of the Katana's spirit causes MP damage to the enemy.
The tears of the Katana's spirit restores HP of allied units.
Magic Katana attack causing damage to enemy units. Adds: Slow
Spirit in the Katana protects allied units, reducing physical and magic damage. Adds: Protect, Shell
Ghosts from the Katana make the enemy act unpredictably and in some cases sentences them to death. Adds: Confusion, Death Sentence
Vengeful spirit makes a beeline toward the enemy.
Katana spirit gradually restores ally's HP and increases speed. Sword for attack must be stolen from Elmdor. Adds: Regen, Haste
Powerful Katana attack that causes a blue flame to attack enemy units. Sword for attack must be found in the Deep Dungeon.
Allows the character to walk or stop on the surface of water.
When critical, allows the character to damage the target in the amount of his or her max HP.
Allows the character to evade physical attacks other than Bow/Crossbow attacks.
Allows the character to equip a knife, regardless of job.
Allows the character to hold his/her weapon with both hands, increasing its attack power.
Samurai-style sword attack.
Cuts enemies within effect radius four times.
Similar to Shock!-the greater your damage, the more damage you can inflict.
The greater the target's damage, the more damage you can inflict.
Attack causes a meteor to fall on targets.
Causes different status anomalies. Adds: Dead, Petrify, Stop
The ultimate limit skill.
The most powerful limit skill.
Raises the character's physical attack power.
Attacks the enemy with a body blow.
Throws a stone at an enemy unit. This is one of the first long-range attacks your characters can learn.
Cures abnormal status effects such as Darkness, Silence, and Poison.
Increases the character's movement range by one panel.
Counters a physical attack with a Dash attack's body blow.
Allows the character to equip an Axe, regardless of Job Classes.
The character can target friendly monsters within a range of three panels, helping them acquire new abilities.
Character defends and prepares for an attack. Activated by choosing the command Defend on the Action menu.
Increases the amount of JP earned in battle. A must-have for the beginning and middle stages of a character's development!
Raises speed by 1 point.
Character offers his own HP to the target, doubling the target's HP.
Raises Brave level by 5 points. Available in Chapter Two.
Raises character's own Brave level, Speed level, Physical and Magic attack powers. Available in Chapter Four.
Powerful magic attack that must be learned from either the assassins, Celia and Lede, or an Ultima Demon when cast on the character. This is possible only during Chapter Four.
Restores a small amount of HP to allies.
Summons Ice Elemental to attack enemies.
Summons Lightning Elemental to attack enemies.
Summons Fire Elemental to attack enemies.
Summons Earth Elemental to attack enemies.
Golem shares ally's damage, allowing them to evade physical weapon damage.
Summoned monster helps allies to reflect magic spells. Adds: Reflect
Summoned monsters enemy with a blast of hot breath.
Summoned monster causes damage to enemies while riding its dragon-horse across the battlefield.
Water Elemental attacks enemies with tsunami.
Summoned Fire Elemental burns battlefield with flaming breath.
Summoned monster silences enemies. Adds: Silence
Summoned fairy restores HP to allies. Effect is more powerful than Moogle.
Summoned Darkness Elemental drains off 50% of the enemy's HP.
Summoned Holy Elemental causes damage to enemies by shaking up the battlefield.
Summoned monster attacks enemies with a strong beam of star light. Must be learned from the Zodiac monster, Elidibs, on the 10th level of the Deep Dungeon.
Restores MP to the character when an attack brings them down to critical levels.
Halves the MP used when casting a spell.
Lowers target's success rate with physical attacks. Adds: Darkness

Prevents target from attacking. Adds: Don't Act

The more damage you receive, the more damage you can inflict on the target.

Character can catch and keep items thrown across the battlefield.
This ability allows you obtain the pelts of monsters you've killed which can be traded for items.
Increases target's speed. Adds: Haste
Increases target's speed. Adds: Haste
Decreases target's speed. Adds: Slow
Decreases target's speed. Adds: Slow

Prevents target from moving. Adds: Don't Move

Allows target to reflect magic spells. Adds: Reflect
Increases speed of AT.
Decreases target's max HP by 25%.
Decreases target's max HP by 50%.
Causes a huge meteor to fall from the sky on top of the target.
Allows the character to move to any space on the battlefield instantly. However, the farther the destination panel, the greater the chance of failure.
Allows the character to float 1 panel above the ground.
The character's AT is elevated to next position when his or her HP totals fall within critical levels.
Character loses MP instead of HP when attacked.
Increases a character's CT speed, halving the time it takes him or her to cast spells.

Large fireball falls from the sky causing a large amount of damage to the target.
